law.catch_line: Furnishing or selling articles to minors for illegal sale.
law.text: No person shall furnish or sell to any minor any article of any description with the knowledge that the minor intends to sell said article in violation of KRS 339.210 to 339.450. No person shall continue to furnish or sell articles of any description to a minor after having received written notice from any officer charged with the enforcement of KRS 339.210 to 339.450, that the minor is not permitted to sell such articles.
law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 256, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 107, sec. 5.
